Sql.query: insert into cpa_total_transmisores ( cpattcodi, cpattanio, cpattajuste, cparcodi, cpattusucreacion, cpattfeccreacion, cpattusumodificacion, cpattfecmodificacion ) values ( :cpattcodi, :cpattanio, :cpattajuste, :cparcodi, :cpattusucreacion, :cpattfeccreacion, :cpattusumodificacion, :cpattfecmodificacion )
select cpattcodi, cpattanio, cpattajuste, cparcodi, cpattusucreacion, cpattfeccreacion, cpattusumodificacion, cpattfecmodificacion from cpa_total_transmisores order by cpattcodi asc
select cpattcodi, cpattanio, cpattajuste, cparcodi, cpattusucreacion, cpattfeccreacion, cpattusumodificacion, cpattfecmodificacion from cpa_total_transmisores where cpattcodi = :cpattcodi
select count(cpattcodi) as contador from cpa_total_transmisores
select count(cpattcodi) as contador from cpa_total_transmisores where cparcodi = {0}

select cpattcodi, cpattanio, cpattajuste, cparcodi, cpattusucreacion, cpattfeccreacion, cpattusumodificacion, cpattfecmodificacion from cpa_total_transmisores where cparcodi = {0} order by cpattcodi asc
select cparestado as estado from cpa_revision where cparcodi = {0}
select count(cpapcodi) as contador from cpa_porcentaje where cparcodi = {0}

select nvl(cpaemptipo, '') cpaemptipo from cpa_empresa where cpaempestado = 'A' and cpaemptipo = 'T' and cparcodi = {0} and (select trim(emprnomb) from si_empresa se where cpa_empresa.emprcodi = se.emprcodi) = trim('{1}')
